title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the AIPropertyManager system, including functional and non-functional requirements, target users, expected system behavior, data models, integration points, security considerations, and compliance requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flows, considering scalability, security, and maintainability.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment, and development tools.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop and implement the backend services for tenant communication, maintenance scheduling, and financial reporting.

title: Develop Frontend User Interface
description: Design and develop the frontend user interface for tenants, property managers, and administrators.

title: Implement Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for tenant information, property details, and financial data.

title: Integrate AI Components
description: Integrate AI components for natural language processing, decision-making, and automation of various tasks.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, data encryption, and secure communication protocols.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish testing and quality assurance processes, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Develop Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AIPropertyManager system, including installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
